scripts.build: npm run build:clean && concurrently npm:build:jed npm:build:mo npm:build:scripts
scripts.build:jed: composer exec -- wp i18n make-json languages --no-purge
scripts.build:mo: composer exec -- wp i18n make-mo languages
scripts.build:scripts: wp-scripts build && wp-scripts build src/entrypoints/*.* --output-path build/entrypoints && rm -Rf build/entrypoints/blocks
scripts.i18n:pot: npm run build:scripts && composer exec -- wp i18n make-pot .
scripts.i18n:po: npm run i18n:pot && ( cd languages && find . -name '*.po' -print -exec msgmerge -U --backup=none {} *.pot \; )
